scripts.crowdin-upload: export CROWDIN_PROJECT_ID=docusaurus; export CROWDIN_API_KEY=d618a1663b548eca3fc7fc7c4294512e; crowdin-cli --config ../crowdin.yaml upload sources --auto-update -b master
scripts.crowdin-download: export CROWDIN_PROJECT_ID=docusaurus; export CROWDIN_API_KEY=d618a1663b548eca3fc7fc7c4294512e; crowdin-cli --config ../crowdin.yaml download -b master
